Game.Name: V-V (Japan)
Game.plot: Grind Stormer is an Action game, developed by Toaplan and published by Tengen,which was released in Japan in 1994.Cheat: Free Play ModeAt the title screen, hold the A, B, and C buttons. Now press the START button [I]100 times[/I]. After this, let go and press the A button. Move down and switch the Credit Limit to ''Free Play'' for unlimited continues.Cheat: Free Play ModeEnter the following code at the Title Screen.... Hold A + B then Press Start 100 times If done corectly you can go into the options menu and change your credit limit to Free Play
